description: Explore your deepest dreams and life goals together

questions.text: What's one dream you've had since childhood that still calls to you?
If you could design your ideal life 10 years from now, what would it look like?
What legacy do you want to leave behind for future generations?
What's something you've always wanted to learn or experience but haven't yet?
How do you want to grow as a person in the next phase of your life?
